column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////I have been many Tapas bars from Coast to Coast. But I must say that the food at Cafe BaBa Reeba was one of the best experiences I have had in the US. The staff was amazing
column2: customer service was great. The Tapas were delicious nothing we ordered was given back. We cleared our plates. The sangria was delicious as well. We drove an hour and a half to test this place out and they didn't disappoint. Great place for kids.
